thread.title: 2023 a good year for PH peace process | The Manila Times
thread.title_full: 2023 a good year for PH peace process | The Manila Times

author: Franco Jose C. Baro√±a
title: 2023 a good year for PH peace process | The Manila Times
text:
THE administration of President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. has achieved much this year in ending the decades-long armed conflict in the country, said Presidential Adviser on the Peace Process Carlito Galvez.
"Major milestones have been achieved in the comprehensive Philippine peace process under the Marcos administration's Five-Point Peace, Reconciliation and Unity agenda," Galvez said, as he delivered the year-end report of the Office of the Presidential Adviser on Peace Reconciliation and Unity.
Presidential Peace Adviser Carlito Galvez Jr. Presidential Peace Adviser Carlito Galvez Jr. Among the achievements he mentioned was the passing of the Bangsamoro Parliament of five of its seven priority codes, which aim to improve the socioeconomic conditions of its people and boost the region's economy.
These include the Administrative Code, Civil Service Code, Electoral Code, Local Government Code, and Education Code.
Galvez said this was an indication that the Bangsamoro Transition Authority has gotten stronger, noting that all seven mechanisms of the National Government-Bangsamoro Government Intergovernmental Relations Body (IGRB) have been functioning.

organizations.name: office of the presidential adviser on peace reconciliation and unity
